<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <plugin id="com.glide.delegated_development" name="Delegated Development" version="1.0.0" help="Delegated Development" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <description> Support for controlled development by users who do not have full administrative rights </description>
<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="DelegatedAclScopeRestrictingAccessHandler" class="com.glide.sys.security.delegateddev.delegatedchecks.DelegatedAclScopeRestrictingAccessHandler" order="-2" /> <extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="ScopeRoleEscalationAccessHandler" class="com.glide.sys.security.delegateddev.scoperoleescalation.ScopeRoleEscalationAccessHandler" order="-1" /> <extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="HardcodedDelegatedDevelopmentAccessHandler" class="com.glide.sys.security.delegateddev.hardcodedaccess.HardcodedDelegatedDevelopmentAccessHandler" order="2" /> <extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="DelegatedDevelopmentAccessHandler" class="com.glide.sys.security.delegateddev.DelegatedDevelopmentAccessHandler" order="5" /> <extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="DelegatedDevModuleAccessHandler" class="com.glide.sys.security.delegateddev.moduleaccess.DelegatedDevModuleAccessHandler" />
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="DelegatedDevelopmentUtil" class="com.glide.sys.security.delegateddev.DelegatedDevelopmentUtil" /> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="DelegatedDevPermissionService" class="com.glide.rest.delegateddev.PermissionService"/>
<extension point="com.glide.ui.navigator.augmenter" name="DelegatedDevNavigatorAugmenter" class="com.glide.sys.security.delegateddev.moduleaccess.DelegatedDevNavigatorAugmenter"/> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Support for controlled development by users who do not have full administrative rights</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Delegated Development</help> <id>com.glide.delegated_development</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Delegated Development</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.delegated_development/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires/> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.delegated_development</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
